scripts.ui:task-system:build: rm -rf src/task-system/release && parcel build src/task-system/index.html --out-dir src/task-system/release --public-url ./
scripts.ui:task-system:package: npm run ui:task-system:build && ax apps package src/task-system/ax-manifest.yml
scripts.ui:dashboard:build: rm -rf src/dashboard/release && parcel build src/dashboard/index.html --out-dir src/dashboard/release --public-url ./
scripts.ui:dashboard:package: npm run ui:dashboard:build && ax apps package src/dashboard/ax-manifest.yml
scripts.node:machine:docker:build-aarch64: npm run node:machine:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t machine-aarch64 -f src/machine/Dockerfile --load .
scripts.node:machine:docker:build-aarch64:packag: npm run node:machine:docker:build-aarch64 && npm run node:machine:package
scripts.node:wago-connector:docker:build: npm run node:wago-connector:build && docker build -t wago-connector -f src/wago-connector/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:wago-connector:docker:build-aarch64: npm run node:wago-connector:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t wago-connector-aarch64 -f src/wago-connector/Dockerfile --load .
npm run node:wago-connector:docker:build-aarch64 && npm run node:wago-connector:package
scripts.node:machine-simu:docker:build: npm run node:machine-simu:build && docker build -t machine-simu -f src/machine-simu/Dockerfile .
scripts.node:machine-simu:docker:build-aarch64: npm run node:machine-simu:build && docker buildx build --platform linux/arm64 -t machine-simu-aarch64 -f src/machine-simu/Dockerfile --load .
